snippet: South Carolina defensive end Jadeveon Clowney would probably be one of the top picks in the N.F.L. draft, but there's one problem: he's not eligible.
abstract: South Carolina defensive end Jadeveon Clowney would probably be one of the top picks in the N.F.L. draft, but there's one problem: he's not eligible.

headline.main: Stop Jadeveon Clowney? Only the N.F.L. Can
